title: I CANT LOG BACK IN
body: I have a freaking ranked match going on and as soon as the loading screen was about to begin it fucking kicks me out of the client and now its giving me an "unknown error occured" and I can't log in to reconnect

replies.body: It sucks to hear your match isn't loading, and I'd like to help!  Your network seems like it's being blacked from reaching the game server, so you'll want to troubleshoot that first.  Run through the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure you can get through.  Test it out in a custom match to prevent any penalties.  Let me know if it helps!
